title: Drawing, "Galloping Horse Motif, Textile Design", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.
description: Pattern of black galloping horses on a cream background with a black border.

Drawing, "Galloping Horse Motif, Textile Design", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-92.
